ch.ethz.csb.youscope.shared.configuration
Interface XMLConfigurationProvider

All Known Implementing Classes:
ChangePositionJobXMLConfigurationProvider, ComposedImagingXMLConfigurationProvider, CompositeJobXMLConfigurationProvider, ConfigurableMeasurementXMLConfigurationProvider, ContinousImagingMeasurementXMLConfigurationProvider, DeviceJobXMLConfigurationProvider, FocusingJobXMLConfigurationProvider, ImagingJobXMLConfigurationProvider, MicroplateXMLConfigurationProvider, MultiCameraContinousImagingXMLConfigurationProvider, MultiPositionJobXMLConfigurationProvider, OscillatingDeviceJobXMLConfigurationProvider, OutOfFocusJobXMLConfigurationProvider, ParallelImagingJobXMLConfigurationProvider, ScriptingJobXMLConfigurationProvider, StatisticsJobXMLConfigurationProvider, WaitForUserJobXMLConfigurationProvider, ZSlidesJobXMLConfigurationProvider
public interface XMLConfigurationProvider

This class is used by YouScope's XML import/export mechanism to obtain information about all classes which can be exported to XML. Each plugin which provides data transfer objects should also expose this service provider.

Author:
Moritz Lang

Method Summary
 java.lang.Class<? extends Configuration>[] getConfigurationClasses()
          Returns an array of all classes which can be saved to XML.

Array of classes which can be saved to XML.
